Title: Bloody Harlan
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Fred Golan, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: The bad blood between the Bennetts and the Crowders reaches its boiling point and results in bloodshed, and Loretta returns from Lexington to avenge her father's death.
